features: Ideal storage solution featuring three curved side shelves, an open top shelf, and a spacious interior
Utilize in the bathroom to store toiletries and display your favorite bathroom décor, or in the living room to store books, children’s toys or display picture frames
Timeless style with one wide-plank, plantation shutter door, rectangular, brushed nickel knob, and a smooth, white painted finish
Adjustable interior shelf that moves up, down, or out for a storage space customized to your needs

body.description: With three curved side shelves, an open top shelf and a spacious interior, this floor cabinet makes an ideal storage solution for any room of the home. Utilize in the bathroom to store toiletries and display your favorite bathroom décor, or in the living room to store books, children’s toys or display picture frames. Features a wide-plank, plantation shutter door, rectangular, brushed nickel knob, and a smooth, white painted finish for timeless style. Door closes softly with the adjustable, self-closing hinges. Interior includes one adjustable shelf that moves up, down, or out for a storage space customized to your needs. Includes easy-to-follow assembly instructions and wall mounting hardware for added safety. Maximize storage and add extra style to your space with any of the additional Brookfield Collection items.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Brookfield Collection! With our Brookfield Collection, you can create a beautifully organized bath or living space with concealed storage, open display shelves, and charming design elements of plantation shutter style doors and brushed nickel knobs. With its bright and clean white finish, this collection exudes a sense of freshness to your room, creating a timeless aesthetic that complements various decor styles. The Brookfield Collection features soft-close hinges to ensure smooth and silent operation, enhancing your user experience and adding a touch of luxury to your furniture. Behind its doors, you'll find convenient and concealed storage space, allowing you to keep your belongings organized and out of sight. The collection also includes open display shelves that not only offer functional storage but also allow you to express your personal style by providing the perfect space to showcase your favorite perfumes, lotions, and decorations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really well made and narrow
reviews.reviewText: I needed a narrow cabinet and it was hard to find one under 10 inches deep. Then this one came up and it was perfect. Just the right depth and height. It came boxed really well with corner guard, a lot of foam blocks/spacers, and foam sheets to protect from scratching. Pretty well made and easy to put together. The modern knob was nice but the edges were too sharp, so I replaced it with a round and smooth knob. Really happy with the purchase. Definitely recommend purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty solid product
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my small guest bathroom and it fit perfect. If you’re looking for something bigger this is not it. It’s big enough to fit a few toilet paper and a few other toiletries. But it’s sturdy and looks really nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful great quality
reviews.reviewText: So beautiful, very good quality. Easy to assemble. Fits perfectly in small space.
